thread.section_title: Melbourne Watch Company Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Melbourne Watch Company | melbournewatch.com.au
thread.title: Rheza Tan
thread.title_full: Melbourne Watch Company reviewed by Rheza Tan

author: Rheza Tan
title: Rheza Tan
text: I bought the Collins for my wife and have a Carlton that I ordered during your Kickstarter campaign. I've also bought the Portsea as a gift in the past. Shipping was very fast and the quality of the watch matches the description and pictures put up on the website. You have not disappoint and I look forward for future models to be released.
